legacy.full_text:
The Chinese MFA published the Position Paper on China's Cooperation with the United Nations on October 10.  Pls see the full text: 
https://t.co/kvyGWbL2lw

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also https://t.co/gGUiTCoPqT
legacy.name: Zhang Jun

legacy.full_text:
Finance serves as the foundation and important element underpinning UN governance. 

At #UNGA76 5C today, I called on developed countries to shoulder more financial responsibilities for the UN and fully take into account the difficulties and concerns of developing countries. https://t.co/8gCBi9rHJ7
China has recently paid in full our assessments for UN peacekeeping operations for the periods for which mandates had been approved by the Security Council by the end of this year.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: We are one of the few Member States that have paid in full. The UN Secretariat is deeply grateful for this.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: We urge the countries in arrears to pay their assessed contributions in full,on time, and without conditions, so as to ensure the effective operation of the UN and meet their commitment to multilateralism through practical actions.

legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: A resolution on colonialism submitted by China and like-minded countries was adopted at #HRC48 that calls for states, UN bodies, agencies and stakeholders to take concrete steps to address the negative impact of the legacies of colonialism on the enjoyment of #humanrights. https://t.co/qCXFLHP2Lr

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Permanent Mission of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also @ChinaAmbUN
legacy.name: Chinese Mission to UN

legacy.full_text: At #UNGA Third Committee, 78 countries made a joint statement at the proposal of China & the African Group. The statement calls for implementing the Durban Declaration and Programme of Action and preventing our future generations from suffering from the brutality of #racism. https://t.co/6CCGX6V2CJ

Decision made by #US and a few western countries to openly boycott and be absent from the High Level Meeting on DDPA 20+ reflected their hypocrisy. These countries should heed the call of international community and take necessary measures to combat racism.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Permanent Mission of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also @ChinaAmbUN
legacy.name: Chinese Mission to UN

legacy.full_text: Today at #UNGA76, Amb. Zhang Jun on behalf of 30 countries delivered a JST urging to lift all UCMs completely and immediately, and calling for solidarity & unity in addressing global challenges and promoting & protecting human rights for all. https://t.co/A96gzhLtPB

UCMs lead to severe economic, social and humanitarian impact in targeted countries and severely hinder their effort for promoting and protecting #humanrights. We call for a complete and immediate lift of all existing UCMs.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Permanent Mission of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations. See also @ChinaAmbUN
legacy.name: Chinese Mission to UN

legacy.full_text: Today at #3C UNGA, Amb. Zhang Jun, on behalf of 74 countries, made a joint statement on vaccine equity, which stresses the importance of right to health and calls on global solidarity to promote fair, affordable, equitable distribution of vaccines globally. https://t.co/xROaWW83rC

“We call on all states and all stakeholders to strengthen global solidarity and jointly promote fair, affordable, equitable, timely and universal distribution and strengthen local production of vaccines around the world.”

legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: At #HRC48,China on behalf of developing countries called upon the equitable distribution of vaccines. Vaccines are effective tools combating the Covid-19 pandemic and should be made as global public goods.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: China at #HRC48 expressed deep concern over the violation of indigenous people’s #humanrights in #US, Canada and Australia. The history of genocide in these countries should not be forgotten and reparation must be made to indigenous people today.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: At #HRC48, besides 65-country joint statement supporting China, another 20+ countries appreciated China’s #humanrights achievements, opposing unfounded allegations against China and interference in China’s internal affairs under the pretext of human rights.

Vice Foreign Minister Ma Zhaoxu on China’s participation in #HRC48: China is firmly committed to a path of human rights development that suits China’s national conditions.
https://t.co/qPDU2gEmS8 https://t.co/gVr7UYPr99

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.description: This is the Permanent Mission of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations Office at Geneva and other International Organizations in Switzerland.
legacy.name: China Mission Geneva

legacy.full_text: Today at #HRC48, 65 countries delivered a JST on opposing unfounded allegations against China out of political motivation, and reiterating Hong Kong, Xinjiang and Tibet related issues are China’s internal affairs that brook no interference by external forces.

At #HRC48, Pakistan on behalf of 65 countries delivered the JST that opposes unfounded allegations against China. Nearly 100 countries have expressed their support for China’s position through joint statement, joint letter and national statements.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: Today, the Permanent Mission of China hosted an online event “Hong Kong’s future will be brighter”. https://t.co/0vqxZfO0xr

At the event, panelists from different sectors of #HKSAR shared observations on positive changes after the implementation of the National Security Law and the electoral system improvement. Envoys in Geneva applauded the event and expressed their support for China’s HK policy.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: Chinese State Councilor and FM Wang Yi made remarks at a briefing on the significance and far-reaching impact of President Xi Jinping’s important statement at the General Debate of the 76th Session of the UNGA.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: Wang Yi: President Xi’s appeal for building a new type of international relations featuring mutual respect, fairness, justice and win-win cooperation provides more stability given the uncertainties in international relations.

legacy.description: The official twitter account of the Department of International Organizations and Conferences, MFA, China
legacy.name: DIOC

legacy.full_text: Wang Yi: President Xi was speaking on behalf of the vast majority of countries and representing China’s commitment to true multilateralism, which demonstrated the resolve to make the global governance system more fair and equitable, and the support to the role and status of UN.
